import React from 'react';
import React from 'react';
import { OperationStep } from './app';

// CDN Import with Cache Bursting
const cdnUrl = "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/nogikun/gemini-gem@main/gem/PDF_Extractor/dist/index.umd.js";

const App = React.lazy(async () => {
  // Check Globals before import (Debug)
  console.log("Globals Check:", { 
    React: !!window.React, 
    ReactDOM: !!window.ReactDOM,
    antd: !!window.antd 
  });

  await import(cdnUrl);
  // @ts-ignore
  return { default: window.PDF_Extractor };
});

export default function Canvas() {
  return <App />
}
